info.name: Anchor API
info.description: Postman collection for Anchor user signup and email verification endpoints

request.description: Register a new user with required fields (firstName, lastName, email, password) and optional fields (userName, mobile). Returns userId and verificationToken on success.

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
    "firstName": "John",
    "lastName": "Doe",
    "email": "john.doe@example.com",
    "password": "SecurePass123",
    "userName": "johndoe",
    "mobile": "+1234567890",
    "userId": "a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-abcd-ef1234567890",
    "verificationToken": "f1e2d3c4-b5a6-7890-cdef-1234567890ab",
    "valid": true,
    "errorMessage": "User registered successfully. Please verify your email.",
    "errors": []
}

response.name: Validation Error
Email Already Exists

response.name: Validation Error
Email Already Exists

request.description: Check if an email address is already registered in the system. Returns true if email exists, false if available.

response.name: Email Available
response.body: false

response.name: Email Already Exists
response.body: true

request.description: Register a new user with only required fields (firstName, lastName, email, password). Username will be auto-generated from email.
